code-runner.executorMap.c: cd $dir && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$root = (Get-Item '$workspaceRoot').FullName; $curr = (Get-Location).Path; $rel = $curr.Substring($root.Length).TrimStart('\'); $out = Join-Path $root (Join-Path 'bin' $rel); if (-not (Test-Path $out)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $out -Force | Out-Null }; gcc '$fileName' -o (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe'); & (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe')"
code-runner.executorMap.cpp: cd $dir && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$root = (Get-Item '$workspaceRoot').FullName; $curr = (Get-Location).Path; $rel = $curr.Substring($root.Length).TrimStart('\'); $out = Join-Path $root (Join-Path 'bin' $rel); if (-not (Test-Path $out)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $out -Force | Out-Null }; g++ '$fileName' -o (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe'); & (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe')"
